name: nextjs-oauth2-demo
description: Next.js OAuth2.0 integration with Google and Discord using RetroUI

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev" --names "API,Frontend" --prefix name
scripts.test:session: node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:3001/api/session/validate', (res) => { console.log('Session endpoint status:', res.statusCode); process.exit(res.statusCode === 200 || res.statusCode === 401 ? 0 : 1) })"
scripts.test:me: node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:3001/api/me', (res) => { console.log('Me endpoint status:', res.statusCode); process.exit(res.statusCode === 200 || res.statusCode === 401 ? 0 : 1) })"
scripts.test:frontend-me: node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:3000/api/me', (res) => { console.log('Frontend Me endpoint status:', res.statusCode); process.exit(res.statusCode === 200 || res.statusCode === 401 ? 0 : 1) })"
scripts.ci:build: npm run build && npm run docker:build
scripts.deploy:staging: echo 'Deploy to staging' && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
scripts.deploy:prod: echo 'Deploy to production' && npm run docker:prod
